name: TinyHTML++
short_description:
This library allows to parse HTML in C++. Its main focus is put on stability and simplicity rather than pure performance.
TinyHTML++ is even able to parse and correct wront HTML documents. It is also possible to get the page in text format as a user of a webbrowser reads it. TinyHTML++ also allows to convert it back to a HTML string.
Please let me know if you find any bugs.
summary: Allows to parse HTML in C++
